main event: A single bright blue light was observed in the sky over Los Angeles, California on April 30, 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared to be in the shape of an 'exclamation mark'.
The sighting was reported to the Napa, California and Fairfield, California police departments.
A weather officer stationed at Travis Air Force Base, Captain Neubauer, observed the object through binoculars and provided an opinion on it.
The radar section at Camp Pendleton, California confirmed a negative radar contact with the alleged UFO on July 19, 1966.
The duration of the sighting was not reported.
sighted object: a single bright blue light in the sky
witnesses: numerous calls to police dispatch, radar personnel at Camp Pendleton
